education.description: I'm currently a student at Life Choices Academy. The academy has given me the opportunity to upskill.
At Cotelligence I've studied from 14-01-23 to 30-06-23& I've gained software basics. Its an academy based in Cape flats offering software development skills
I have studied at Harry Gwala Secondary School from 2013 to 2017 and I passed my grade 12 my majors were Physics,Life science & Geography.

testimonials.name: Taryn-lee
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu is a beautiful person with an exceptional personality, she is extremely intelligent and has so much ambition for what she does.

testimonials.name: Mzwamadoda
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu  is hardworking person dedicated to her work and she enjoys solving challenges, Anathi goes above and beyond her duties and she is the go to person for problem solving also attention to detail.

testimonials.name: Sivuyisiwe
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu is a very intelligent young lady who always strives for the best despite facing challenges. She is the true definition of persistence pays off.

testimonials.name: Nathalie
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu is kind-hearted person, she always willing to help other people to achieve their goaals. She is a hard worker and she is friendly .

testimonials.name: Siseko
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu is kind and humble person ,she communicates well with other people and she always willing to help other people to achieve their goals.  .

testimonials.name: Sisipho
testimonials.quotes: Anathi Josefu is kind-hearted person,consistent and She is a hard worker.
